name: Griptape Backbone
description: A relaxing meditative and Zen like first person vaporwave skateboarding game. An interactive mixtape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher 64bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Standard Mouse (Mouse with Scroll Wheel & Right Click)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Standard Mouse (Mouse with Scroll Wheel & Right Click) & good quality headphones
